channel.title: Deep Learning on Eclipse IoT
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Eclipse IoT

item.title: Applying Machine Learning to IoT Use Cases with Eclipse Deeplearning4j | Eclipse IoT Day SC 2019
item.author: webdev@eclipse-foundation.org (Eclipse Foundation)
item.description: In this talk, we will discuss high-level machine learning use cases for IoT, provide an overview of the Eclipse Deeplearning4j ecosystem of tools, and tie it all together with a couple of real-life examples. This talk is aimed at Business Analysts and Solution Architects seeking ideas and inspiration for applying machine learning to IoT.
